TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract JournalItem implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._JournalItem, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.ItemEvents_10_Event

summary.span: 代表“日记”文件夹中的日记条目。

span.span: Represents a journal entry in a Journal folder.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的事件成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the event members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 日记条目代表在任何给定时期所有由 Outlook 处理的事务的记录。

span.span: A journal entry represents a record of all Outlook-moderated transactions for any given period.

para.span: 使用方法可创建代表新日记条目的JournalItem对象。

span.span: Use the method to create a JournalItem object that represents a new journal entry.

para.span: 使用()，其中是日记条目或用来匹配的日志项，从日记文件夹中返回单个JournalItem对象的默认属性的值的索引号。

span.span: Use (), where is the index number of a journal entry or a value used to match the default property of a journal entry, to return a single JournalItem object from a Journal folder.
